dstm2.benchmark

Class RBTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • dstm2.benchmark.IntSetBenchmark
      • dstm2.benchmark.RBTree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Benchmark, java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Integer>

    public class RBTree
extends IntSetBenchmark
    Red-Black tree benchmark. Adapted from http://www.codeproject.com/csharp/RedBlackCS.asp
